æ€»ç»“ä¸€äº›å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç®—æ³•æ€è·¯å’Œæ¨¡æ¿

æœç´¢
#

1. äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾
# 

int binary_search(vector<int>& nums,int target)
{
 int left = 0;
 int right = nums.size() - 1;
 while(left < right){
 int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
 if(nums[mid] > target){
 right = mid - 1;
 }else if(nums[mid] < target){
 left = mid + 1;
 }else{
 return mid;
 }
 }
 return -1;
};

2. åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ
# 

 // æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)
 // ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)
class Solution {
public:
 int removeElement(vector<int>& nums, int val) {
 int slowIndex = 0;
 for (int fastIndex = 0; fastIndex < nums.size(); fastIndex++) {
 if (val != nums[fastIndex]) {
 nums[slowIndex++] = nums[fastIndex];
 }
 }
 return slowIndex;
 }
};

æ’åº
#

1. æ’åº-é€‰æ‹©æ’åº
# 

void selectionSort(vector<int>& nums) {
 int n = nums.size();
 for(int i = 0; i < n-1; i++){
 int k = i;
 for(int j = i+1; j < n; j++){
 if(nums[j] < nums[k]){
 k = j;
 }
 }
 swap(nums[i],nums[k]);
 }
}

2. æ’åº-å†’æ³¡æ’åº
# 

void bubbleSort(vector<int>& nums) {
 int n = nums.size();
 for(int i = n-1; i>0; i--){
 for(int j = 0; j < i; j++){
 if(nums[j] > nums[j+1]){
 swap(nums[j],nums[j+1]);
 }
 }
 }
}
